title: Chomsky: Today's Republican Party is a Candidate for Most Dangerous Organization in Human History
description:
http://democracynow.org  - We speak with world-renowned political dissident Noam Chomsky about the Republican party, the rightward shift in U.S. politics and the 2016 election.
